org.restlet.ext.apispark

Class FirewallUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.ext.apispark.FirewallUtils

  • public class FirewallUtils
extends Object
    Helps to generate firewall rules.
    Author:
    Guillaume Blondeau

      static void addHostDomainConcurrencyCounter(FirewallFilter firewall, int limit)
      Adds a rule that limits the number of concurrent requests by request's host domain.
      static void addHostDomainPeriodicCounter(FirewallFilter firewall, int period, int limit)
      Returns a rule that limits the number of requests for a given period of time by request's host domain.
      static void addIpAddressesBlackList(FirewallFilter firewall, List<String> blackList)
      Returns a rule that forbids access to the given set of IP addresses.
      static void addIpAddressesConcurrencyCounter(FirewallFilter firewall, int limit)
      Returns a rule that restricts access according to the IP address of the request's client.

      Returns a rule that restricts access by period of time according to the IP address of the request's client.

      Returns a rule that restricts access to the given set of IP addresses.

      Returns a rule that restricts access according to the Role of the current authenticated User.

      Returns a rule that restricts access according to the Role of the current authenticated User.

    • Method Detail

      • addHostDomainConcurrencyCounter

        public static void addHostDomainConcurrencyCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                                   int limit)
        Adds a rule that limits the number of concurrent requests by request's host domain.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        limit - The maximum number of requests allowed by host domain at the same time.

      • addHostDomainPeriodicCounter

        public static void addHostDomainPeriodicCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                                int period,
                                int limit)
        Returns a rule that limits the number of requests for a given period of time by request's host domain.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        period - The period of time.
        limit - The maximum number of requests allowed by host domain for the given period of time.

      • addIpAddressesBlackList

        public static void addIpAddressesBlackList(FirewallFilter firewall,
                           List<String> blackList)
        Returns a rule that forbids access to the given set of IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        blackList - The list of rejected IP adresses.

      • addIpAddressesConcurrencyCounter

        public static void addIpAddressesConcurrencyCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                                    int limit)
        Returns a rule that restricts access according to the IP address of the request's client. A unique limit is applied for all IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        limit - The maximum number of accepted concurrent requests.

      • addIpAddressesPeriodicCounter

        public static void addIpAddressesPeriodicCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                                 int period,
                                 int limit)
        Returns a rule that restricts access by period of time according to the IP address of the request's client. A unique limit is applied for all IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        period - The period of time.
        limit - The maximum number of accepted requests for a period of time.

      • addIpAddressesWhiteList

        public static void addIpAddressesWhiteList(FirewallFilter firewall,
                           List<String> whiteList)
        Returns a rule that restricts access to the given set of IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        whiteList - The list of accepted IP adresses.

      • addRolesConcurrencyCounter

        public static void addRolesConcurrencyCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                              Map<String,Integer> limitsPerRole)
        Returns a rule that restricts access according to the Role of the current authenticated User. Each role is defined a limit in terms of concurrent requests, in any other case the access is forbidden.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        limitsPerRole - The limit assigned per role's name.

      • addRolesConcurrencyCounter

        public static void addRolesConcurrencyCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                              Map<String,Integer> limitsPerRole,
                              int defaultLimit)
        Returns a rule that restricts access according to the Role of the current authenticated User. Each role is defined a limit in terms of concurrent requests, in any other case a default limit is applied.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        limitsPerRole - The limit assigned per role's name.
        defaultLimit - The limit assigned for any other roles, or for user without assigned role.

      • addRolesPeriodicCounter

        public static void addRolesPeriodicCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                           int period,
                           Map<String,Integer> limitsPerRole)
        Returns a rule that restricts access according to the Role of the current authenticated User. Each role is defined a limit in terms of requests by period of time, in any other case the access is forbidden.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        period - The period of time.
        limitsPerRole - The limit assigned per role's name.

      • addRolesPeriodicCounter

        public static void addRolesPeriodicCounter(FirewallFilter firewall,
                           int period,
                           Map<String,Integer> limitsPerRole,
                           int defaultLimit)
        Returns a rule that restricts access according to the Role of the current authenticated User. Each role is defined a limit in terms of concurrent requests, in any other case a default limit is applied.
        Parameters:
        firewall - The firewall.
        period - The period of time.
        limitsPerRole - The limit assigned per role's name.
        defaultLimit - The limit assigned for any other roles, or for user without assigned role.
